answers.answer: If your diabetic, it'll cause lung development problems... Other more serious problems too. Look it up.
i have about 7 weeks left and M controlling my sugar through my diet. this is my 2nd child and the 1st one i had justional diabetes too.
I flunked my 1st test...didn't wanna sit 3hrs...so my doc told me watch what I eat...i also get pricked every time I go...& they monitor my weight...I'm now 38wks 2day
You are allowed to refuse the test but there is a different way to do it. I'm not sure off the top of my head but I personally don't see the big deal in doing the test.

question: I do not want tot take the 3 hour test. my 1st was high at 150 so my doctor wants me to take the 3hour one. I am controlling what i eat and borrowed my moms finger pricker thing to check my bloodsugar. IS it harmful to my baby and i if i dont take the 3hour test?? I am 33 weeks pregnant.
title: I do not want to take the 3hour glucose test! Do i really have to?
